Description: Complete authentication flow including sign in, sign up, password reset functionality
Dashboard interfaces for all user roles: Elder, Family, Admin, Volunteer
RESTful API endpoints for all system functionality
Health metrics tracking and medication management features
Activity scheduling and event management functionality
System testing, Docker configuration, and deployment

As a user, I want to sign in with my email and password so that I can access my dashboard. Includes role selection (Elder/Family/Admin/Volunteer), email field, password field, and Forgot Password link.
As a new user, I want to register an account so that I can use the ElderCare system. Includes role selection, name, email, password fields with validation.
As a user, I want to request a password reset so that I can recover my account. Email input with verification.
As a user, I want to reset my password using the reset link so that I can regain access to my account.
Create MongoDB User schema with fields: name, email, password (hashed), role, createdAt, resetToken.
Create authentication controller with login, register, forgotPassword, resetPassword functions.
Create Express routes for /api/auth/login, /api/auth/register, /api/auth/forgot-password, /api/auth/reset-password.
Create authentication middleware to protect routes using JSON Web Tokens.
Integrate Axios calls from React pages to backend authentication endpoints.
As an elder, I want to see my personalized dashboard with health info, medications, and upcoming activities.
Create reusable sidebar component with navigation links for all dashboard pages.
Create MUI-based card component for displaying dashboard widgets and information.
As a family member, I want to view my elder's health status and schedule activities.
As an admin, I want to manage users, view system statistics, and configure settings.
As a volunteer, I want to see assigned tasks and elder information for my visits.
Implement protected routes that redirect users based on their role after login.
Create public landing page with service information and sign in/sign up links.
Create informational page describing ElderCare services and features.
Create MongoDB Elder schema with personal info, emergency contacts, medical history fields.
Create MongoDB HealthMetric schema for tracking vitals: blood pressure, heart rate, glucose, weight.
Create MongoDB Medication schema: name, dosage, frequency, startDate, endDate, reminders.
Create MongoDB Activity schema: title, description, date, time, type, participants.
Create MongoDB Event schema for community events: title, description, date, location, capacity.
Implement admin API endpoints: user management, statistics, system configuration.
Implement family API endpoints: view elder info, schedule visits, send messages.
Implement volunteer API endpoints: view assignments, update task status, log visits.
Display current health metrics with visual indicators for elders and family members.
Form for caregivers to input daily health measurements.
Visualize health trends over time using charts (blood pressure, weight, etc.).
Create CRUD endpoints for health metrics: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE /api/health.
Display current medications with dosage, frequency, and next reminder time.
Form to add/edit medications with scheduling options.
Create CRUD endpoints for medications: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE /api/medications.
Implement reminder notifications for medication schedules.
Display activities and appointments in a calendar format.
Form to create and schedule new activities with participants.
Create CRUD endpoints for activities: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE /api/activities.
Display upcoming community events for elders and families.
Allow users to register for community events.
Create CRUD endpoints for events: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE /api/events.
Implement in-app notifications for reminders and updates.

Summary: [TEST] Write Unit Tests for Auth Module
Description: Create Jest tests for authentication controller and middleware.

Summary: [TEST] Write Unit Tests for API Endpoints
Description: Create Jest tests for all API routes and controllers.
Create React Testing Library tests for key components.
Test frontend-backend integration across all features.
Set up Dockerfiles for frontend and backend services.
Create docker-compose.yml for orchestrating all services.
Configure GitHub Actions for automated testing and deployment.
Configure environment variables and production settings.
Document all API endpoints with request/response examples.
Write user documentation for all system features.
